channel.title: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?
channel.description:
What happened: I do not see the game available through steam? Is this for backers only or veterans as well?
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Supposed to be able to download(?) the game from steam in order to play
I just got my code in the email today...when I went to enter my code it says that my code has already been redeemed or is invalid. Why is that?
Also, I don't know what I'm doing wrong, but I can't seem to link my imperium to my steam account. They share an email address.

item.title: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Heya! To activate the game you’ll nee to go to your steam library and click “add a game” on the bottom left, then the “activate a product on steam” you should be able to enter the code after clicking through the stuff.

(damn it orange!)

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?

item.title: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
You have to directly redeem the Steam key. Looking up how to do so is probably your best bet (I’d elaborate but a quick Google search will do the trick).

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?
item.dc:creator: RennyWest
item.description:
I have a similar problem (probably caused by my stupidity) - when I go to the steam page, it doesn’t show the game is available. Insted I see “summer 2017”, even though I already have my alpha key.
So how do I connect my steam account with my imperium account?
Thanks for a reply.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Key not working and can't connect through Steam?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Snapplesaucy:

I just got my code in the email today…when I went to enter my code it says that my code has already been redeemed or is invalid. Why is that?

Please PM me your email and I will investigate.

Snapplesaucy:

Also, I don’t know what I’m doing wrong, but I can’t seem to link my imperium to my steam account. They share an email address.

When you say “you can’t”, can you please elaborate? I need some info to help

Read full topic
